verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- And thou son אָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- take לְךָ֣׀ le-Cha חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev knife חַדָּ֗ה <S%H2299><s%> chad-Dah, thee a sharp תַּ֤עַר <S%H8593><s%> Ta-'ar razor הַגַּלָּבִים֙ <S%H1532><s%> hag-gal-la-Vim thee a barber's תִּקָּחֶ֣נָּה <S%H3947><s%> tik-ka-Chen-nah take לָּ֔ךְ Lach, וְהַעֲבַרְתָּ֥ <S%H5674><s%> ve-ha-'a-var-Ta and cause [it] to pass עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשְׁךָ֖ <S%H7218><s%> ro-she-Cha upon thine head וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and זְקָנֶ֑ךָ <S%H2206><s%> ze-ka-Ne-cha; and upon thy beard וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta then take לְךָ֛ <S%H99999><s%> le-Cha מֹאזְנֵ֥י <S%H3976><s%> moz-Nei thee balances מִשְׁקָ֖ל <S%H4948><s%> mish-Kal to weigh וְחִלַּקְתָּֽם׃ <S%H2505><s%> ve-chil-lak-Tam. and divide

שְׁלִשִׁ֗ית <S%H7992><s%> she-li-Shit, a third part בָּא֤וּר <S%H217><s%> ba-'Ur with fire תַּבְעִיר֙ <S%H1197><s%> tav-'Ir Thou shalt burn בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, of the city כִּמְלֹ֖את <S%H4390><s%> kim-Lot are fulfilled יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei when the days הַמָּצ֑וֹר <S%H4692><s%> ham-ma-Tzor; of the siege וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֣ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta and thou shalt take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֗ית <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shit, a third part תַּכֶּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> tak-Keh [and] smite בַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> va-Che-rev it with a knife סְבִ֣יבוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H5439><s%> se-Vi-vo-Tei-ha, about וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <S%H7992><s%> ve-hash-she-li-Shit and a third part תִּזְרֶ֣ה <S%H2219><s%> tiz-Reh thou shalt scatter לָר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> la-Ru-ach, in the wind וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ve-Che-rev a sword אָרִ֥יק <S%H7324><s%> 'a-Rik and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. after

וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta Thou shalt also take מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham also מְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> me-'At thereof a few בְּמִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> be-mis-Par; in number וְצַרְתָּ֥ <S%H6696><s%> ve-tzar-Ta and bind אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam בִּכְנָפֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3671><s%> bich-na-Fei-cha. them in thy skirts

וּמֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> u-me-Hem like ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again תִּקָּ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> tik-Kach, Then take of them again וְהִשְׁלַכְתָּ֤ <S%H7993><s%> ve-hish-lach-Ta and cast אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> Toch them into the midst הָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh, of the fire וְשָׂרַפְתָּ֥ <S%H8313><s%> ve-sa-raf-Ta and burn אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh; them in the fire מִמֶּ֥נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu some תֵצֵא־ <S%H3318><s%> te-tze- come forth אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh [for] thereof shall a fire אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit into all the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהֹוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD זֹ֚את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-Ru-sha-Lim, This [is] Jerusalem בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch it in the midst הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim of the nations שַׂמְתִּ֑יהָ <S%H7760><s%> sam-Ti-ha; I have set וּסְבִיבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H5439><s%> u-se-vi-vo-Tei-ha [that are] round about אֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> a-ra-Tzot. and countries

וַתֶּ֨מֶר <S%H4784><s%> vat-Te-mer And she hath changed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִשְׁפָּטַ֤י <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tai my judgments לְרִשְׁעָה֙ <S%H7564><s%> le-rish-'Ah into wickedness מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- more הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, more than the nations וְאֶ֨ת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֻקּוֹתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tai, and my statutes מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- than הָאֲרָצ֖וֹת <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-ra-Tzot more than the countries אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-Tei-ha; that [are] round about כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בְמִשְׁפָּטַי֙ <S%H4941><s%> ve-mish-pa-Tai my judgments מָאָ֔סוּ <S%H3988><s%> ma-'A-su, her for they have refused וְחֻקּוֹתַ֖י <S%H2708><s%> ve-chuk-ko-Tai and my statutes לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not הָלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-le-Chu they have not walked בָהֶֽם׃ <S%H99999><s%> va-Hem. ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh GOD יַ֤עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because הֲמָנְכֶם֙ <S%H1995><s%> ha-ma-ne-Chem Because ye multiplied מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- have more הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim more than the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-tei-Chem, that [are] round about בְּחֻקּוֹתַי֙ <S%H2708><s%> be-chuk-ko-Tai in my statutes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor הֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <S%H1980><s%> ha-lach-Tem, you [and] have not walked וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tai my judgments לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Tem; neither have kept וּֽכְמִשְׁפְּטֵ֧י <S%H4941><s%> u-che-mish-pe-Tei according to the judgments הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim of the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-tei-Chem that [are] round about לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Tem. neither have done ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich I am against גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- even אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni; I וְעָשִׂ֧יתִי <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ti Behold I even I [am] against thee and will execute בְתוֹכֵ֛ךְ <S%H8432><s%> ve-to-Chech in the midst מִשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tim judgments לְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei of thee in the sight הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim. of the nations

וְעָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ti And I will do בָ֗ךְ Vach, אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will never עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti, in thee that which I have not done וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- of which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will never אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-Seh and whereunto I will not do כָמֹ֖הוּ <S%H3644><s%> cha-Mo-hu and the like ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od; again יַ֖עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an any more the like because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all תּוֹעֲבֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-vo-Ta-yich. of all thine abominations ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore אָב֞וֹת <S%H1><s%> a-Vot Therefore the fathers יֹאכְל֤וּ <S%H398><s%> yo-che-Lu shall eat בָנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim the sons בְּתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Chech, in the midst וּבָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nim of thee and the sons יֹאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> yo-che-Lu shall eat אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam; their fathers וְעָשִׂ֤יתִי <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ti and I will execute בָךְ֙ voCh שְׁפָטִ֔ים <S%H8201><s%> she-fa-Tim, judgments וְזֵרִיתִ֥י <S%H2219><s%> ve-ze-ri-Ti of thee will I scatter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all שְׁאֵרִיתֵ֖ךְ <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-ri-Tech in thee and the whole remnant לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to every רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach. into all the winds פ Peh

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen So חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- Wherefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, I נְאֻם֮ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> Lo, no יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an because אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִקְדָּשִׁ֣י <S%H4720><s%> mik-da-Shi my sanctuary טִמֵּ֔את <S%H2930><s%> tim-Met, Surely because thou hast defiled בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all שִׁקּוּצַ֖יִךְ <S%H8251><s%> shik-ku-Tza-yich with all thy detestable things וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all תּוֹעֲבֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-vo-Ta-yich; and with all thine abominations וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- will also אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אֶגְרַע֙ <S%H1639><s%> 'eg-Ra' therefore will I also diminish וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no תָח֣וֹס <S%H2347><s%> ta-Chos spare עֵינִ֔י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Ni, [thee] neither shall mine eye וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- will also אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo no אֶחְמֽוֹל׃ <S%H2550><s%> ech-Mol. neither will I have any pity

שְׁלִשִׁתֵ֞יךְ <S%H7992><s%> she-li-shi-Teich A third part בַּדֶּ֣בֶר <S%H1698><s%> bad-De-ver with the pestilence יָמ֗וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mu-tu, of thee shall die וּבָֽרָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> u-va-ra-'Av and with famine יִכְל֣וּ <S%H3615><s%> yich-Lu shall they be consumed בְתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <S%H8432><s%> ve-to-Chech, in the midst וְהַ֨שְּׁלִשִׁ֔ית <S%H7992><s%> ve-Hash-she-li-Shit, of thee and a third part בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev by the sword יִפְּל֣וּ <S%H5307><s%> yip-pe-Lu shall fall סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-Ta-yich; round about וְהַשְּׁלִישִׁית֙ <S%H7992><s%> ve-hash-she-li-Shit a third part לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to every ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach into all the winds אֱזָרֶ֔ה <S%H2219><s%> 'e-za-Reh, thee and I will scatter וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ve-Che-rev a sword אָרִ֥יק <S%H7324><s%> 'a-Rik and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. after

וְכָלָ֣ה <S%H3615><s%> ve-cha-Lah be accomplished אַפִּ֗י <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pi, Thus shall mine anger וַהֲנִחוֹתִ֧י <S%H5117><s%> va-ha-ni-cho-Ti to rest חֲמָתִ֛י <S%H2534><s%> cha-ma-Ti and I will cause my fury בָּ֖ם bam וְהִנֶּחָ֑מְתִּי <S%H5162><s%> ve-hin-ne-Cha-me-ti; upon them and I will be comforted וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that I the LORD דִּבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti have spoken בְּקִנְאָתִ֔י <S%H7068><s%> be-kin-'a-Ti, [it] in my zeal בְּכַלּוֹתִ֥י <S%H3615><s%> be-chal-lo-Ti when I have accomplished חֲמָתִ֖י <S%H2534><s%> cha-ma-Ti my fury בָּֽם׃ Bam.

וְאֶתְּנֵךְ֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-'et-te-neCh Moreover I will make לְחָרְבָּ֣ה <S%H2723><s%> le-cha-re-Bah thee waste וּלְחֶרְפָּ֔ה <S%H2781><s%> u-le-cher-Pah, and a reproach בַּגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim among the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-Ta-yich; that [are] round about לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei thee in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all עוֹבֵֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> o-Ver. of all that pass by

וְֽהָ֨יְתָ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-Ha-ye-Tah will be a חֶרְפָּ֤ה <S%H2781><s%> cher-Pah So it shall be a reproach וּגְדוּפָה֙ <S%H1422><s%> u-ge-du-Fah and a taunt מוּסָ֣ר <S%H4148><s%> mu-Sar an instruction וּמְשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H4923><s%> u-me-sham-Mah, and an astonishment לַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> lag-go-Yim unto the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-Ta-yich; that [are] round about בַּעֲשׂוֹתִי֩ <S%H6213><s%> ba-'a-so-Ti thee when I shall execute בָ֨ךְ vach שְׁפָטִ֜ים <S%H8201><s%> she-fa-Tim judgments בְּאַ֤ף <S%H639><s%> be-'Af in thee in anger וּבְחֵמָה֙ <S%H2534><s%> u-ve-che-Mah and in fury וּבְתֹכְח֣וֹת <S%H8433><s%> u-ve-to-che-Chot rebukes חֵמָ֔ה <S%H2534><s%> che-Mah, and in furious אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti. have spoken
